survey_name: Parental Satisfaction with Childcare Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from parents regarding their satisfaction with childcare services, including quality of care, safety, and communication.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of care provided by the childcare service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of care provided by the childcare service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the childcare service do you value the most? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to select multiple options to understand priority areas.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection with a maximum of 3 selections allowed.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the childcare service do you value the most? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How frequently do you communicate with the childcare providers?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to assess communication frequency.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How frequently do you communicate with the childcare providers?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the childcare service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the childcare service?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this childcare service to other parents?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to measure net promoter intent.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this childcare service to other parents?
